metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000346 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the other party DH public key is not fully validated. This can cause issues as invalid keys can be used to reveal details about the other party's private key where static Diffie-Hellman is in use. As of release 1.56 the key parameters are checked on agreement calculation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbcjmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcpg-java - 1.60-1
libbcpkix-java - 1.60-1
libbcprov-java - 1.60-1
libbctls-java - 1.60-1
libbcutil-java - 1.60-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
